title: Short-Intensive Course for Developing English Oral Presentation and Online Collaboration Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English communication skills and basic presentation techniques
context.additional_context: Practice-centered design to enhance workplace applicability for current practitioners, strengthening mobile learning and asynchronous collaboration using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can effectively organize and deliver a 5-minute English oral presentation.
Learners can collaboratively develop presentation content with peers using online collaboration tools.
Learners can self-assess and improve presentation skills through a digital feedback system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
